attributes.title: Drunk Man
attributes.actor: Paul PortelliA '''drunk man''' is an unnamed minor character in the Season 1
attributes.3: yes==References==ReflistCategory:CharactersCategory:Minor CharactersCategory:Status: AliveCategory:Unnamed CharactersCategory:Characters from the Crownlands

sections.Biography:
===[[Season 1]]===
He stumbles into Littlefinger's room at the brothel on the arm of a [[King's Landing whore]]. Littlefinger is meeting with [[Catelyn Stark]] and waves them away.<ref>"[[Lord Snow]]"</ref>
